Title: DxFluentUI
Description:
A fluent API to create user interfaces using DevExpress WinForms controls.

The goal of this project is to provide an abstraction layer on top of DevExpress controls to more easily create business applications.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A fluent API to create user interfaces using DevExpress WinForms controls.

The goal of this project is to provide an abstraction layer on top of DevExpress controls to more easily create business applications.

For more information about Fluent API's, see Martin Fowler's article http://www.martinfowler.com/bliki/FluentInterface.html
For more information on DevExpress controls, see http://www.devexpress.com/

Syntax

Horizontal Grid
Vertical Grid

You can find more information on http://sdesmedt.wordpress.com
